message.body: What time is out class
7pm-10pm
Oh ok
Thanks
I like your project ideA
WAnt to hang out and work on our videos together?
Just wake up... Yes I have not started the video.. Too bad, I don't even get a topic...
Yay 4th fl party
I feel drowsy and indisposed :(
Sick lady. Ok tAke it easy
Sofie, is the class at 6:30 or 6:00?
We moved it up a half an hour.., but I don't remember when it was supposed to be
Then it's 6:00... >< I just got up "formally"
U must feel good!
How are you feeling?
I feel vomiting...
Ok I'll Tell joe drink a lot of water
Is your land lord around?
Oh it sucks to brick and far away from home. If you need anything let me know
Thank you Sofie, I feel a little better after a 14 hour sleep... But I missed Joe's seminar this morning, terrible
It's ok!!!! We missed you!!! You must get better! I'm glad you feel better
I'm thinking about canceling the trip to Rhode island because I'm still feel no good
I think that's a good idea
My dad loves your memory box
Oh, thank you, you're so sweet <3
I end up coming to the conference because I feel bad to miss something because of illness. I felt so bad that I missed the class, so I think I should conquer it!!

But it's raining heavily and I spent 1 hour outside waiting for the shuttle because the staff gave me wrong information. And I left my luggage at the register desk this morning but when I come back the building closed and I cannot find anyone to help me. So I'm now standing outside of the building and I don't even got an umbrella... I think I'll getting worse after this conference ...
